Bio: I’m Tim Green — a web developer in Canberra Australia. I have a passion for strong, simple websites.I have 13 years of experience working in both an advertising agency and freelance capacity, mainly focusing on building websites/web applications which are simple to use and look great. I worked with some great agencies, government organisations, individuals and start-ups to their reach both business and website goals.
Experience: Web Developer at 2B Advertising and Design - 2011-2018
Web Developer at Roof Rack City Canberra - 2008-2010
Skills: Various social media tools like HootSuite, AgoraPulse and Buffer
WP CLI (The command line interface for WordPress)
A few sites I've built: Rosewood - A simplistic theme for blogging  - https://themes.timgreen.ws/booth/
Flywheel - A simple theme for Drupal  - https://drupal.timgreen.ws
